Visit Requirements
Define what constitutes a full or half day based on visits
8 visits

Minimum visits required for a full day

4 visits

Minimum visits required for a half day

How it works:

  • Employees with 8 or more visits are marked as full day
  • Employees with 4 to 7 visits are marked as half day
  • Employees with fewer than 4 visits are marked as absent
